name: Death From Space
description:
Death From Space is a top down shoot 'em up where you defend Earth from killer asteroids.

You play as the last known fighter pilot who has survived an initial onslaught on the planet. With the help of your A.I. co-pilot, upgrade your weapons and eliminate any incoming threats.

You are humanity's last hope.

Controls

A - rotate left
D - rotate right
Left Mouse - Primary Fire
Right Mouse - Secondary Fire (when meter has energy)
Esc - Pause Game

This game is free to download. If you enjoyed playing it and would like to support my future games, please consider donating.
